Name: huge_wrasse_6127
Text: Honestly, I find the endless fan theories about Geralt’s past and the Witcher timeline more confusing than illuminating—sometimes I think the lore gets lost in its own complexity.

Comments.Name: yellow_platypus_914
Comments.Text: Absolutely, the lore’s richness can be a double-edged sword—sometimes less clarity makes the world more intriguing, other times it just muddles the story.

Comments.Name: wild_toad_1527
Comments.Text: The depth is what makes it legendary, but I can see how it might overwhelm new fans trying to keep up.
